page.title: 06LANGTOFT GENERAL STORE
page.content: LANGTOFT STORE Since I have been living in Langtoft there has been three owners in three years.I think that because there has been three owners profit may not have been very good.The shop sells food,cigarettes,sweets,alchohol,soft drinks and dog and cat food.David the man there at the moment seems to be sticking to it and is probably is making a profit.The shop opens at 0800 and closes at 2000 every day of the week except Wednesday which opens at the normal time but closes at 1400 and Sundays 1000 and closes at 1400 so it is very conveneant for every body.David rents the shop off Mrs.Flatters.the shop is a general store and sells Soada_Streams and most other things.But David also sells groceries more than any thing and the busiest days of the week are Friday
